alert.note: Alert for Orleans; Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:20AM CDT until May 06 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 918 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East New Orleans to 7 miles south of Lafitte, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. St. Charles Parish emergency manager reported multiple trees down near Paradis. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Belle Chasse, Chalmette, Lake Catherine, Violet, Meraux, Shell Beach and Poydras. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 256. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
